Draw line 7 from the point (0.0274, 0.6387) to the point (0.0, 0.6113). 9. Draw line 8 from the point (0.0, 0.6113) to the point (0.0, 0.0274). This sketch completes the top face of the rectangular prism. The bottom face of the prism is created by mirroring the top face along the X-Y plane. The dimensions of the sides and height are given in the description section. Extrusion Extrude the sketch by 0.0091 units towards the normal of the sketch plane and 0 units in the opposite direction. Use a sketch scaling parameter of 0.75. Final Shape The final shape of part 1 is a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. The sides are parallel and the top and bottom faces are perpendicular to the sides. The dimensions of the sides are equal, and the height is half the length of the sides. The length and width of part 1 are 0.75 units, and the height is 0.0091 units.</description>
